results.title: Combined effects of metformin and photobiomodulation improve the proliferation phase of wound healing in type 2 diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: We concluded PBM and PBM + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatments significantly hastened repair at the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and proliferation steps of repairing @<m>DISEASE_Degloving_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000069836 @@@skin injury@@@ in a non-genetic model of T2 @DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@.

citations.NLM: Bagheri M, Mostafavinia A, Abdollahifar MA, Amini A, Ghoreishi SK, Chien S, Hamblin MR, Bayat S, Bayat M. Combined effects of metformin and photobiomodulation improve the proliferation phase of wound healing in type 2 diabetic rats. Biomed Pharmacother. 2020 Mar;123():109776. PMID: 31911295
citations.BibTeX: @article{31911295, title={Combined effects of metformin and photobiomodulation improve the proliferation phase of wound healing in type 2 diabetic rats.}, author={Bagheri M and Mostafavinia A and Abdollahifar MA and Amini A and Ghoreishi SK and Chien S and Hamblin MR and Bayat S and Bayat M}, journal={Biomed Pharmacother}, volume={123}, pages={109776}}

results.title: Metformin Alleviates Radiation-Induced Skin Fibrosis via the Downregulation of FOXO3.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suppresses radiation-induced @<m>DISEASE_Degloving_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000069836 @@@skin injuries@@@ by modulating the expression of @GENE_FOXO3 @GENE_56484 @@@FOXO3@@@ through @GENE_PIK3R1 @GENE_18708 @@@PIK3r1@@@.

citations.NLM: Kim JM, Yoo H, Kim JY, Oh SH, Kang JW, Yoo BR, Han SY, Kim CS, Choi WH, Lee EJ, Byeon HJ, Lee WJ, Lee YS, Cho J. Metformin Alleviates Radiation-Induced Skin Fibrosis via the Downregulation of FOXO3. Cell Physiol Biochem. 2018;48(3):959-970. PMID: 30036874
